page_content:
— 56
2020 IMPACT REPORTBumping elbows 
with the community
Our work with the communities 
close to our main operations 
focused on strengthening 
social organizations and 
developing education and technology 
programs that support young people's 
access to jobs and entrepreneurship, 
creating a more inclusive future. 
 
The year 2020 challenged us to be 
present in new communities and to 
develop alternate formats to implement 
our programs. We focused on offering 
solutions to pair with business growth 
and diversification, and on adapting to 
the health emergency context. 
The year 2020 challenged 
us to be present in new 
communities and to 
develop alternate formats to 
implement our programs. ⊲ SOCIAL IMPACT
